title: WWDC22 Wishlist: 25 features we want Apple to announce for iOS 16
content:
The Worldwide Developers Conference Â — our favorite time of the year — is right around the corner! For many of us, it’s more exciting than the actual iPhone event. Apple will be holding the main keynote of WWDC22 on June 6. There’s plenty to expect from this event and even more to wish for. For

The post WWDC22 Wishlist: 25 features we want Apple to announce for iOS 16 appeared first on XDA.
description: These are 25 features we really want Apple to include in iOS 16 when it reveals the new version during the main WWDC22 keynote.
